author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-964 TaskTracker changes got missed in the Y! dist patch. Attaching the TT side changes required for stopping negative values.

author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-270. Fix the tasktracker to optionally send an out-of-band heartbeat on task-completion for better job-latency. Contributed by Arun C. Murthy
+60. MAPREDUCE-270. Fix the tasktracker to optionally send an out-of-band
+    heartbeat on task-completion for better job-latency. Contributed by

author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-1030. Fix capacity-scheduler to assign a map and a reduce task per-heartbeat. Contributed by Rahuk K Singh.
+59. MAPREDUCE-1030. Fix capacity-scheduler to assign a map and a reduce task
+    per-heartbeat. Contributed by Rahuk K Singh.

author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-1028. Fixed number of slots occupied by cleanup tasks to one irrespective of slot size for the job. Contributed by Ravi Gummadi.
+58. MAPREDUCE-1028. Fixed number of slots occupied by cleanup tasks to one
+    irrespective of slot size for the job. Contributed by Ravi Gummadi.

author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-964. Fixed start and finish times of TaskStatus to be consistent, thereby fixing inconsistencies in metering tasks. Contributed by Sreekanth Ramakrishnan.
+57. MAPREDUCE-964. Fixed start and finish times of TaskStatus to be
+    consistent, thereby fixing inconsistencies in metering tasks.
